body_html:
@drpngx I'm facing the exact same issue on version 1.5.0. As I keep performing inference on an Android device, the memory consumed by the app keeps increasing.

No. of Inference runs Memory usage
1 5.7 Mb
15 206 Mb
20 242 Mb
25 757 Mb
30 922 Mb

Is there a fix for this issue?

body:
@drpngx  I'm facing the exact same issue on version `1.5.0`. As I keep performing inference on an Android device, the memory consumed by the app keeps increasing.

No. of Inference runs     |  Memory usage
-------------------------- | ------------------
1                                     |     5.7 Mb
15                                   |     206 Mb
20                                   |     242 Mb
25                                   |     757 Mb
30                                   |     922 Mb


Is there a fix for this issue?
